Verein.title: About our club
Verein.intro: Treue Husaren Fürth is a traditional carnival club that has been shaping the fifth season in Fürth and the surrounding area for many years.
Verein.groupsDescription: Whether dancer, organiser or tech nerd – everyone can find the right group with us.
Verein.groupGuardDesc: Our dance groups bring both modern and traditional performances to the stage.
Verein.groupYouthDesc: This is where the youngest members take their first steps on stage – playful and full of fun.
Verein.groupElferratDesc: The faces on stage: hosting, speeches and the typical Treue Husaren humour.
Verein.groupTechDesc: Sound, light and music – our tech team ensures that everything works perfectly on and off stage.
Verein.boardDescription: The board of Treue Husaren Fürth e.V. coordinates club life and represents the club externally.
Verein.boardMember1Desc: Responsible for overall coordination and representation.
Verein.boardMember2Desc: Liaison between dance groups, active members and board.
Verein.boardMember3Desc: Responsible for finances, fees and accounting.
Verein.ctaText: You want to become part of Treue Husaren – as a dancer, in the tech team or organisation?
